about_the_game:
Game Description

This is a text-based AVG game.A text-based adventure game with a theme of another world, featuring a total of fifteen different endings and various plot branches. Players will play as an office worker named Li Zhaoyin, and have a series of love stories with Xie Yuan and Yun Qingchen,They will learn the truth and make choices.

Plot introduction

Li Zhaoyin accidentally got caught up in an infinite dungeon on his way to work one day, and woke up to find himself in the midst of a snowy mountain. The cold wind howled, butchers, ghosts, everything was too incredible, and the development of the situation would be up to you.

hot tip

The worldview of this story is different from that of the real world. The story involves vulgar words, violent hints, supporting role killing innocent people and other violent content, which is not suitable for all players to read. Please buy carefully.

Everything that happens in the story is purely fictional. Please distinguish between reality and fiction and do not imitate any dangerous actions.

The character's values do not represent the author's values.

This work is for entertainment purposes only and has no other meaning.

content_descriptors.notes: 故事涉及流血、血液喷溅画面、粗鄙言语。
